name: Instant Tomato & Veggie Soup
description: Have 15 minutes? Then you can make this delicious soup in a hurry. Jam-packed with nutrient-dense ingredients, this recipe is the perfect side to any meal.

ingredients.name: Marinara Sauce or Poco Picante Salsa
3 Onion Dip Mix
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or Epicure dip mix, your choice

preparation: In a Multipurpose Pot stir broth with marinara sauce and dip mix.
Bring to a boil, then add frozen vegetables. Simmer, stirring often for 3–5 min, until warm.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and 1 cup starchy veggies or grains.

products.name: Vegetable Broth Mix
summary: Make a tasty vegetable broth in a matter of seconds! Same garden-fresh flavour as making it from scratch—just add water!

products.name: Marinara Sauce Mix
summary: A simple, kid-friendly sauce that speaks volumes, Marinara is packed with the bright flavour of garlic, oregano, and basil. Pair it with your fave pasta and use it as a base layer for delicious homemade pizza.

products.name: Poco Picante Salsa Mix
summary: The vibrant flavours of cayenne, chilies, and garlic come together to create a zesty salsa with a medium kick.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!
